title: Clash
description: The only easy thing about Jude and Lucy’s relationship is their love for one another. Everything else is hard.Especially when it comes to reining in Jude’s trigger touch temper and Lucy’s increasing jealousy of Jude’s Spirit Sister on the cheer squad who’s attached herself to him in just about every way a girl could. Feeling the stress of trying to hang on to her quintessential bad boy while becoming the foremost dancer in her class, Lucy knows something’s going to break. She wants both. She needs both. But if she doesn’t make a choice, she risks losing everything.For Lucy Larson and Jude Ryder, love might be the thing that just isn’t enough
author: Nicole  Williams
